definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: He hoped to form a new civilization in our county under the instruction of bout in and out.
sentences.chinese: 希冀在“補瀉兼用”的“藥方”指導下形成新的文明。

definition: treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
to feel the pulse (TCM)/Taiwan pr. [zhen3 mo4]
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
nine orifices of the human body (eyes, nostrils, ears, mouth, urethra, anus)
